data.prayer: Lord, make the 1,122 believers in Vågø to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 2,278 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Vågø, Faroe Islands
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, please send new apostles into the harvest, who can open up new communities for the gospel in the state of Vågø, Faroe Islands.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.section_summary: On average, 2 babies will be born in the next month to families who might know about God culturally, but likely have no relationship with Jesus in Vågø, Faroe Islands.
data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to these new families.
Father, encourage the 1,122 believers to have boldness before you, since they have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus the Son of God.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Spirit, please give every church in the state of Vågø a passion to plant another simple church.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Sørvágur
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Sørvágur, Vågø, Faroe Islands.
Lord, we pray for the believers in Vågø, Faroe Islands to be more like Jesus in their love for friends and enemies.
data.verse: But I tell you, love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you.

data.prayer: Father, help the 1,122 believers in Vågø to know that you can make a big impact through their simple obedience today.
data.verse: you will be for me a kingdom of priests

data.section_summary:
the state of Vågø, Faroe Islands has a population of 3,400.

We estimate Vågø has 1,122 people who might know Jesus, 1,969 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 309 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 3 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, make bold the prophets in Vågø, Faroe Islands so that the church can be equipped with truth and insight and a vision of your heart.
data.verse: These are the things which you should do: speak the truth to one another; judge with truth and judgment for peace in your gates.
